concept.title: Compatibility with the IBM troubleshooting specialization
concept.shortdesc: This topic describes how the current IBM troubleshooting specialization could be derived from the candidate troubleshooting specialization.

section.title: Feasibility
section.p: The current IBM troubleshooting specialization could easily be derived from the candidate troubleshooting topic. The next section shows the specialization sources used in the current implementation. The last section suggests alternative specialization sources from the candidate troubleshooting specialization.

section.title: Current specialization attribute sources
section.p: The elements in the current IBM troubleshooting specialization are derived from a combination of the following sources:
* topic/para is an implementation error in the tsResponseRoleAction specialization attribute. There is no <para> element in base DITA.

section.title: New specialization attribute sources
section.p: These specialization attribute sources would allow the IBM troubleshooting specialization to use the candidate troubleshooting specialization as a base.
